description: The Fenix HM65R-DT Dual Spotlight Headlamp is a new version of the best-selling HM65R Headlamp that features dual spotlights—one spotlight of cool white light, for longer distances, and the other with a very warm 3000K light for better performance in foggy, poor weather conditions. Turn both on at the same time for a combined maximum of 1500 lumens. Powered by the included li-ion battery, this headlamp is USB-C rechargeable and includes a battery level indicator. It is made of a magnesium alloy which makes it 30% lighter than similar headlamps made of aluminum. The HM65R-DT with its IP68 waterproof rating is the perfect option for those needing hands-free performance that can weather the elements.
name: HM65R-DT Headlamp - 1500-Lumens

specs.value: Six modes including three cool spotlight levels and three warm spotlight levels
Luminus SST40 white and SST20 warm white LED
